title: NDEx TSV Loading Plan
description: Loading plan used by TSV loader

id_prefix.description: Prefix that need to be added to the id column

id_column.description: Column that will be used as the represent field of a node. The first non-empty value in the list will be used to populate the node represent field.

node_name_column.description: The name of a node. If id_column is missing in this object, the node_name will be used as a unique id of a node. This version of TSV loader requires node name to be unique in a network

property_columns.description: Defines the mapping of all node properties. An Each of the non-empty value in these columns

context.description: Declare the namespaces that are used in this TSV file.

default_predicate.description: default value for edge name (interaction name).

predicate_id_column.description: column that specify the edge name. If the value in this cell is missing, we will use the value defined in 'defalut_predicate', if it exists.

citation_id_column.description: Data in this column will be added as a edge property called 'citiation_ids'. Value in the cells of this column can be a single id or a comma seperated id list.

citation_id_prefix.description: The prefix need to be added to the citation. If it is a list defining this prefix value will cause an error
